document_data.name: Lesser Spellsong
document_data.level2e: {{spell table|edition=2e|[[Cleric]]|3|}}<ref group="note">This spell is listed as a 3rd-level spell in both ''Champions of Valor'' and ''Demihuman Deities'' but is listed as a 4th-level spell in ''The Drow of the Underdark''.
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lesser spellsong''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Eilistraee]].
document_data.Effects: A weaker version of ''[[Eilistraee's Spellsong|spellsong]]'', this spell gave the caster the ability to immediately prepare a single divine spell for use. The spell was cast normally, even if it required casting components. The spell could not be greater than a 1{{st}}-level spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a [[divine focus]].
